parameters: There's no power cord, but it seems to be
\."So once the battery's dead, it's over.
Want to investigate what's on it, but..."
This might be a trap, too
This might be a trap, too
But we can't not investigate it, you know?"
\."This laptop is locked with a password."
\."So you can't see what's stored on it?"
but all I accomplished was draining the battery..."
\."And if it opens with someone's name...
There's a good chance they're the laptop's owner!"
\."...But if it's a name we don't know,
there'd be no way for us to learn it."
"Don't tell me... You know the name
then we'll find the answer in 365 tries!"
I'm guessing you wanna make me do it."
\."It'd be best if we could just conveniently
find a piece of paper with the password..."
\."Now that would definitely be a trap."
\."Hmm... If we just had a hint..."
\."Maybe this is a hint from the kidnappers."
that's valuable to us, but worthless to them."
\."\C[2]Solve the riddle, and we'll generously give it out.
If you can't, it doesn't matter to us\C[0]... Like that."
\."And we can't see it once the battery goes dead,
so it's like a time-limited treasure chest."
\.\C[4](...I can't see them being that kind.)
and work on figuring out the password!
Miss Sara, tell me if you find any clues."
\.\C[4](But do I need to have hope, and keep my head up...)
Maybe Sou will be able to keep his head up, too.)
\C[3]A laptop is placed on the desk.
\."I'll try to crack the password, miss Sara."
\C[3]A laptop is placed on the desk.
\."I... I can't lend a hand there.
trying to think about the password."
\.\C[4](The laptop that was here is gone...!!)
I saw a green glow toward the back.
\.\C[4](...Keiji and Gin aren't looking this way...)
I'm not looking at anything. It's fine.)
\.\C[3]I got out from underneath the desk and raised my head.
\.\C[3]I quickly returned the card to where it was.
\."You got whacked in the back of the head.
Doesn't seem to have caused bleeding, though."
Did you see what was on it?
Did you see what was on it?
Not the password... or what data was on it..."
So somebody used the confusion to steal it."
If you get restless... you'll let it all get away."
\."...Hold up. Joe's searching the first floor.
We shouldn't be hasty just yet."
\."Good point. Don't want our feelings nor our actions
to be all over the place."
...We should take the time to sort things out."
\.\C[4](Is there... someone malicious in our midst...?)
There's only the light from that stand."
\."What did you want to show me in this place?"
\C[3]It's hard to see in the dark,
But they're all blank notebooks on the inside."
\."Keiji was saying there might be a meaning
to the ordering of the books, though."
\C[3]It's hard to see in the dark,
\.\C[3]Sou was lying face-down in the darkness.
Hey, get a hold of yourself."
\."Gin, could you look outside the room?"
\."There's signs of him being whacked in the head..."
\C[3]A card with Keymaster written on it.
It reads: "This is a key to the exit.
You will die if someone learns of this card."
A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.
\C[3]A stopper at the bottom of the bath. Small and heavy.
